name: Cube Roll Frenzy
description:
Get ready to roll out for an adventure! Test your skills in this new free lite game! Choose one of many unique heroes, emoji and cube-like cute characters and shapes and try to reach the highest score! Tap once to change directions and find your way through all the dangers! Free arcade game! Very simple and very fun! Your cube rolls faster over time! Avoid obstacles along the way! Escape all dangers and traps! Space world full of action! Competition games for everybody! Hard survival games! Become a legend and beat’em up! Play with friends! Take on this challenge! It’s a game for everyone, boys, girls, family! Easy to learn hard to master! Frenzy is here! Be the best and get most points! Remember about collecting powerups on the way! Free game, no payments, no pay to win! No microtransactions! Make highscore your achievement! Collect coins and unlock new champions! Fun arcade game for all! It’s gameplay gets fast and furious quickly! Beautiful colorful cute world in space never ends! Pretty graphics and effects! Blocky, Cube, Chicken, Mage, Adventurer, small and cute, many more heroes to choose from! See and play them in this cubic world. Colorful trees and rocks on the way to avoid, lava and ice pools, spikes and holes will make it crazy fun! Jumping arrows will push you over traps! Extremely fast! Game looks different every time! Jump and roll! Best rolling game on the market! Solve your way through like a puzzle game! Think fast and roll out of troubles! Invite and challenge your friends and family and see who’s the boss! True rivalry! Find the best strategy to go furthest! Survive the frenzy! Lovely and great classic arcade game! Rich, colorful environment! Try it out now for free! Tons of hours of gameplay and great replayability! Unlock all the characters and choose your own personal favourite!

Features:
40 unique specially crafted heroes!
An endless, colourful self-generating world!
Tons of interesting obstacles! Jumping arrows, pools of lava and ice, holes and spikes!
New colors every new play!
Very simple rules! Just tap to play!
No pay to win! Absolutely free!

Upcoming Features:
Multiplayer with many people! Compete with other players!
Even more colors!
New obstacles randomizing for every play!
New custom characters!
Road changing the way both vertically and horizontally!
Constant updates for even faster and prettier gameplay!
Special survival mode!
Adventure world mode!
Craftable skins for characters! Collect the resources on the way!
Achievements!
